entity.name: ECT TEST - White House instructs staff to wear masks after two test positive

text: @realDonaldTrump @SpeakerVos Ask the President to do a rally this weekend in Wisconsin and you stand with him, without masks and NO TESTS IN WHITE HOUSE FOR A MONTH!!! Come on Big Boys!!! #COVID19 #coronavirus #Covid19US
